Hey there, this is the basic html and css for elements on Ashlyn's Angular Template and iCracked.com. Check out the repository and a sample of the template being used on my portfolio site. Some of this code originated from development work done at iCracked.com, a previous employeer with a great engineering team.

The github for this repo is here.
